Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:NGP (>50% apoptosis at 20 µM); SK-N-AS (0% apoptosis at 10 µM); SK-N-AS (10% apoptosis at 20 µM); IMR-5 (15% apoptosis at 10 µM); NGP (20% apoptosis at 10 µM); IMR-5 (20% apoptosis at 20 µM); NB69 (30% apoptosis at 10 µM); NGP (30% apoptosis at 50 µM); SK-N-AS (30% apoptosis at 50 µM); IMR-5 (50% apoptosis at 50 µM); NB69 (80% apoptosis at 20 µM); NB69 (80% apoptosis at 50 µM)
Sequence Information.Comments: Induce apoptosis in highly malignant NB-derived cell lines

Literature.Title: BH3 peptidomimetics potently activate apoptosis and demonstrate single agent efficacy in neuroblastoma
Literature.Author: Yao Z, Qiu S, Wang L, Lu R, Zhou CL, Zhao PP, Li HQ, Gao WY.
